plays.text: Goal scored by Ryan Smyth assisted by Eric Brewer and Todd Marchant
Penalty to Jonathan Cheechoo 2 minutes for Interference Mike Comrie
Penalty to Mike Rathje 2 minutes for Obstruction - Interference Ethan Moreau
Penalty to Vincent Damphousse 2 minutes for Hooking Mike Comrie
Penalty to Steve Staios 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Patrick Marleau
Goal scored by Scott Hannan assisted by Vincent Damphousse and Patrick Marleau
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice
Penalty to Steve Staios 2 minutes for Holding Niko Dimitrakos
Penalty to Teemu Selanne 2 minutes for Diving Eric Brewer
Penalty to Mike Comrie 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Vincent Damphousse
Penalty to Todd Marchant 2 minutes for Holding the Stick(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Todd Marchant assisted by Ryan Smyth and Ales Hemsky
